About Dee

Dee has always thought robots were incredibly cool. Since moving in with a group of monkeys who have degrees in engineering, physics, artificial intelligence and electronics, she has become increasingly interested in the hows and whys of robotics. This is her attempt to make the step from tinkering with LEDs to producing fully automated robots capable of sophiticated and interesting tasks. She will attempt not to injure herself, her cats or her husband in the process.

03042010: Good news, everyone!

Hooray! The site is live! currently on my todo list are:

  1. News posts
  2. contact and subscription details
  3. links
  4. blogs
  5. articles and essays

Also, the header imagine should now link to the main page, the footer is updated and the CSS is slightly more functional. Hooray!
